snippet.title: Mother: Russia: 「Questions」 Trailer
snippet.description:
Mother: Russia is a game is set in the earthbound equivalent to early 90s Russia. Developed using a Custom Earthbound Engine!

A side story set in the Mother universe, Mother Russia takes place after the events of Earthbound and follows the reaction of a world that was invaded by an alien threat.

In these turbulent times, two soviet troublemakers find a crashlanded escape pod of the Harbinger-Starman, one of the last remaining members of Giygas's forces. Their discovery leads them on an adventure that takes them on a wild-goose chase across the country as they uncover hidden truths about their everyday life while learning more about their mysterious companion from beyond the stars.

• A new twist on the typical Mother Setting! (By that I mean more snow...)
• Non-Silent Protagonists!
• Slightly more involved combat with Mario RPG style action commands!
• Character customization with multiple classes for each character

Learn more and follow progress on the Mother Forever Thread!
https://forum.motherforever.net/threads/mother-russia.239/
And join the Discord while you are at it!
https://discord.gg/ze36365
